security_issues.description: Default bridge network provides less isolation
security_issues.recommendation: Use custom bridge networks for better isolation

recommendations.title: Implement Network Segmentation
implementation: Create custom bridge networks for different service tiers
Use Docker network policies to restrict inter-container communication
Implement network namespaces for additional isolation
Deploy network monitoring for traffic analysis
